 <!-- Contact details -->

<script>
  (function () {
    const friendly = document.getElementById('friendly');
    const wrap = document.getElementById('friendly-notes-wrap');
    function toggleNotes() {
      wrap.style.display = friendly.value && friendly.value !== '' ? 'block' : 'none';
    }
    friendly.addEventListener('change', toggleNotes);
    toggleNotes();
  })();
</script>
